import authService from "../services/auth.service" const Navigation = () => { const auth = localStorage.getItem("user") const logout = () => { authService.logout() .then((response)=>{ alert(response.data.message) }) .catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) alert(error.response.data.error) }) } return (
